title: Intelligent Domain Name Generator
original_prompt: I hope you can act as an intelligent domain name generator. I will tell you what my company or idea is about, and you will reply to me with a list of domain name options based on my prompts. You will only reply with the domain list and not any other content. The domains should contain a maximum of 7-8 letters, be short but unique, and can be familiar words or non-existent words. Do not provide explanations. Reply "confirm" to confirm.
input1_ans:
1. Tchwav.com
2. Wavetech.com
3. Tchwve.com
4. Waveteq.com
5. Tchvag.com
6. Wavtch.com
7. Tchwve.com
input2_ans:

5. Fdopia.com
